As a Living Fountain 

     Every true Christian is a living fountain, ever receiving of the unfailing streams of grace, ever refreshed and ever refreshing those that are around him. Those who are coworkers with God manifest a missionary spirit; for they are ever receiving, that they may ever be giving to others the light and blessing of heaven. Those who open their hearts to receive largely will be able to give largely. [THIS PARAGRAPH FROM THE SABBATH SCHOOL WORKER, AUGUST, 1892, WAS OMITTED IN TSS.]
